free_games.game_name: World of Tanks — A Present From Vinnie Pack
free_games.description: Winter fun has arrived in World of Tanks! Grab Holiday Ops resources to upgrade your Festive Village and an eye-catching decal with this exclusive, time-limited Holiday Ops Gift Pack DLC! Add the bundle to your account for free to get 50 of each Holiday Ops resource (Meteoric Iron, Pure Emerald, Rock Crystal, and Warm Amber) and 3 "Present from Vinnie" decals.
Cirrus Armor Bundle, Cumulus Syandana, Stratus Pistol Skin, Spektaka Color Palette, and 3-day Resource Booster.

free_games.game_name: World of Tanks — Snatch Gift Pack
free_games.description:
The Snatch Gift Pack DLC includes:
- 3 projection decals: Good Luck Charm
- 3 Large Repair Kits
- 3 Large First Aid Kits
- 3 Automatic Fire Extinguishers

free_games.game_name: World of Tanks Blitz - Bene Gesserit Pack
free_games.description:
The Bene Gesserit Pack includes:
- Lady Jessica Profile Background
- Bene Gesserit Epic avatar
- Garage slot
- 3 days of Premium Account
- 5 certificates for x5 XP
- 5 Epic Combat XP boosters

free_games.game_name: World of Warships x Azur Lane: Free Intro Pack
free_games.description:
The Azur Lane: Free Intro Pack includes:
- 1x Azur Lane container
- 5x “Azur Lane — Siren” expendable camouflages
- Access to the Azur Lane Dorm Port

free_games.game_name: World of Warships x Azur Lane — AL Avrora Free Unlock
free_games.description:
Play 5 battles to obtain:
- AL Avrora - Tier III Premium Soviet cruiser
- A Port slot
- A Commander with 3 skill points trained for AL Avrora
